title: Electrode binder design for high-power, low-Pt loading and durable high temperature fuel cells
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00646A, Paper
Hui Li, Peipei Zuo, Wenyi Wu, Gonggen Tang, Junkai Fang, Tongwen Xu, Zhengjin Yang
We propose and synthesize a multifunctional pentafluorophenyl phosphonated ionomeric binder of intrinsic microporosity, enabling high-power, low-Pt loading and durable high-temperature fuel cells up to 240 Â°C.
